Player History
Drafted in 33rd round, 515th overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2015, off Lawrence Barber (KC)...
Injured on 4/24/2015 with a Pulled Tricep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 5/5/2015 with a Bruised Jaw, out for one week...
Released by Houston on 9/8/2015...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/13/2016 to a 2-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Kansas City on 4/12/2016.
Was claimed off waivers by St. Louis (B) on 5/12/2016.
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 2/10/2017.
Was claimed off waivers by Philadelphia on 3/4/2017.
Released by Philadelphia on 4/1/2017...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 8/15/2017 to a minor league deal...
Released by St. Louis (B) on 10/3/2017...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 3/1/2018 to a minor league contract.
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 5/26/2019 to a minor league deal...
Hit first career homerun on 6/22/2019, off Cleo Maldonado (DET)...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 3/1/2021 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 8/14/2021 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
